    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Elemental Trade](/Feats.aspx?ID=2566) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Oread" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=304" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 106 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have a strong connection with stone and metal. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4). If you would automatically become trained in Crafting (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You gain the [Specialty Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=844) skill feat for both Stonemasonry and Blacksmithing.
